content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/spotDL/spotify-downloader.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image as the base image
FROM python:3.9-slim

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install Poetry
RUN pip install poetry

# Install the dependencies in-place
RUN poetry install

# Activate the virtual environment and run tests to verify the setup
RUN poetry run pytest
